IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik in preteklik.

sense.def:
To beat someone or something
pomeni nekoga zelo močno udarjati.

seg.quote: His stepfather used to beat him.
The rain beat against the window.

sense.def:
Kadar ptica ali žuželka
beats its wings
ali kadar
its wings beat
, se njena krila premikajo gor in dol.

seg.quote: Some birds beat their wings as fast as 80 times a second.
Flies can move their wings at 1000 beats per second.

sense.def:
Kadar srce ali žila
beats
, utripa nepretrgoma v enakomernem ritmu.

The beat of someone's heart or pulse
je en sam udarec srca ali žile.

seg.quote: He could feel the beat of her heart.

sense.def:
The beat of a piece of music
je osnovni ritem neke skladbe.

To beat eggs, cream, or butter
pomeni z vilicami ali metlico močno mešati jajca, smetano ali maslo.

To beat someone in a competition
pomeni v tekmovanju nekoga premagati oziroma biti boljši.

Besedo
to beat
uporabljamo v izrazih, kot je
It beats me
, da povemo, kadar nečesa ne razumemo ali ne znamo pojasniti;

seg.quote: What beats me is where they get the money from.

sense.def:
Policist, ki je
on the beat
, je v službi in hodi po območju, za katerega je pristojen.

Kadar sonce
beats down
, je zelo vroče in svetlo.

Kadar dež
beats down
, močno dežuje.

To beat down a person
pomeni, da človeka, ki nam nekaj prodaja, prisilimo, da privoli v nižjo ceno.

To beat a person up
pomeni nekoga večkrat udariti ali brcniti.

seg.quote: He told us that he had been beaten up by the police.
